articles.description: Not only a novelist, Yu is also a screenwriter who’s written for television shows like Lodge 49, Legion, and Westworld.
articles.content: On Wednesday, science-fiction writer Charles Yu was awarded the 2020 National Book Award for Fiction for his satirical novel Interior Chinatown. The award was announced by committee chair Roxane Gay,… [+1506 chars]

articles.description: The 28-year-old Canadian rapper's attorney Shawn Holley appeared on his behalf in an LA County court to plead his case according to a Wednesday report from TMZ .
articles.content:
Tory Lanez has pleaded not guilty to charges that he had shot fellow rapper Megan Thee Stallion.
